pullRequest.title: Validate sponsored members after creating of sponsorship
pullRequest.bodyText:
sponsored members could be expired (after first sponsorship ends), so
we need to be sure that new sponsorship will validate them again (and
also remove their expiration date)

nodes.bodyText: I would suggest moving this log to the end of the method. If any of the next operations fail, the process of the AuditEvent would be done unnecessarily.

commit.message:
Validate sponsored members after creating of sponsorship

 - sponsored members could be expired (after first sponsorship ends), so
 we need to be sure that new sponsorship will validate them again (and
 also remove their expiration date)
